src:
Bertemu 1,5 Jam, Ini yang Dibahas Luhut dan Prabowo
07 Nov 2019, 12:23 by Anisa Indraini


Foto: Menhan Prabowo Subianto bertemu Menko Maritim Luhut Binsar Pandjaitan/Achmad Dwi Afriyadi-detikFinance

Jakarta - Menteri Pertahanan Prabowo Subianto hari ini bertandang ke kantor Menteri Koordinator Bidang Kemaritiman dan Investasi Luhut Binsar Pandjaitan.Berdasarkan pantauan detikcom, Prabowo keluar dari kantor Luhut sekitar pukul 18.30 WIB. Setelah sebelumnya ia datang sekitar pukul 16.50 WIB.Seusai bertemu Luhut, Prabowo bercerita maksud dan tujuannya. Dia bilang, sebagai Menteri baru dirinya meminta saran kepada Luhut yang sudah senior."Beliau ini kan senior saya, beliau Menko di bidang maritim, ya saya tentunya minta saran, minta pemikiran-pemikiran beliau," kata Prabowo di kantor Luhut, Kamis (7/11/2019).Sebagai menteri baru, Prabowo mengatakan sering meminta saran kepada menteri lain. Ke depan, dia akan sering mendatangi menteri-menteri lain untuk meminta masukan."Saya sering keliling ke semua menteri, semua nanti satu-satu saya minta masukan," imbuhnya.Terkait saran apa yang diberikan Luhut untuk dirinya, Prabowo tidak mau memberikan keterangan secara jelas."Kok mau tahu kamu," ucapnya kepada wartawan.Simak Video "Tak Diambil Prabowo, Berapa Sih Gaji Menteri Pertahanan?"[Gambas:Video 20detik](zlf/zlf)
text:
Meet 1.5 hours, this is what Luhut and Prabowo discussed
Nov 7, 2019, 12:23 by Anisa Indraini


Photo: Defense Minister Prabowo Subianto meets Maritime Coordinating Minister Luhut Binsar Pandjaitan / Achmad Dwi Afriyadi-detikFinance

Jakarta - Defense Minister Prabowo Subianto today visited the office of the Coordinating Minister for Maritime Affairs and Investment Luhut Binsar Pandjaitan. Based on the AFP monitoring, Prabowo left the Luhut office at around 6:30 pm West Indonesia Time. After he arrived at around 16.50 West Indonesia Time. When he met Luhut, Prabowo told him about his aims and objectives. He said, as the new Minister he asked for advice from Luhut who was already a senior. "He is my senior, he is the Coordinating Minister for maritime affairs, yes I certainly ask for advice, ask for his thoughts," Prabowo said in Luhut's office, Thursday (7 / 11/2019) As a new minister, Prabowo said he often asked other ministers for advice. In the future, he will often go to other ministers to ask for input. "I often go around to all ministers, all later I will ask for input," he added. Regarding what advice Luhut gave to him, Prabowo did not want to give information "How do you want to know you," he told reporters. Watch Video "Not Taken Prabowo, How Much Salary of the Minister of Defense?" [Gambas: Video 20 seconds] (zlf / zlf)
